pr_title: Throw exception if using blocking mailer from IO thread

timeline.message:
Throw exception if using blocking mailer from IO thread

This prevents a potential deadlock.

Fixes #3223

timeline.bodyText:
There's a typo in the error message:

If you want to send main from...

Should have been "If you want to send mail from..."
